The '''Fishing Association Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]]. They are obtainable from Fishing Associations, along with their [[Refinement Material]]s.

All weapons in this series share the same Base ATK range of '''42-510''', and the same Secondary Stat: '''Energy Recharge''' range of '''10.0%-45.9%'''
